toc_entry.title: 1984 Bum Steer Awards
toc_entry.description: Presenting Carolyn Farb, worthy successor to Dolph Briscoe, Farrah Fawcett, J. R. Ewing, Mike Martin, and Jackie Sherrill as Bum Steer of the Year—and 107 other fascinating foibles.

toc_entry.title: All the Better To See You With, My Dear
toc_entry.description: Are eye surgeons miraculously changing the lives of folks with glasses as thick as Coke-bottle bottoms, or are they just making themselves rich ?

toc_entry.title: Love And Death In Silicon Prairie Part I: Candy Montgomery’s affair
toc_entry.description: Urban refugees fleeing high-tech Dallas have created ersatz rural communities in the nearby countryside. This isolated, pastoral life sometimes erupts into adultery and murder.

toc_entry.title: Gambling On the Gamblers
toc_entry.description: Jerry argovitz made himself unpopular with NFL management as an abrasive player’s agent. Now that he owns Houston’s new football team, he finds himself on the other side of the table-and the issues.

toc_entry.title: The Collins Purse
toc_entry.subtitle: Texas Primer
toc_entry.description: In the sixties a small company in Medina produced a wooden box decorated with rhinestones. It became a Texas tradition.

toc_entry.title: That’s a Metal Building?
toc_entry.subtitle: architecture
toc_entry.description: The greening (and redding, and yellowing, and blueing) of the prefabricated warehouse.

toc_entry.title: Caravan Of Pipe Dreams
toc_entry.subtitle: Theater
toc_entry.description: From the city that brought you the Stockyards and Billy Bob’s Texas comes a bizarre nightclub run by the shock troops of the avant-garde.

toc_entry.title: Unabridged Webster
toc_entry.subtitle: Jazz
toc_entry.description: You may not have heard saxman Ben Webster when he was around, but his recordings with Duke Ellington, Benny Carter, and Gerry Mulligan are a treasure trove not to be missed.

toc_entry.title: The Godfather Goes Slumming
toc_entry.subtitle: Movies
toc_entry.description: Al Pacino carries on the gangster tradition in Scarface; the mystery in Gorky Park is not whodunit but who’ll survive the investigation; Yentl is a Barbra Streisand tour de force.

toc_entry.title: The Roar Of the Crowd
toc_entry.description: A better Dallas, a wider conspiracy, a madder Wichita Falls.

toc_entry.title: Around the State
toc_entry.description: A selective statewide guide to amusements and events.

toc_entry.title: Reporter
toc_entry.description: Damming the Rio Grande; cruising the streets of Houston; building the nation’s biggest organ; remembering the alamo.

toc_entry.title: Touts
toc_entry.description: Have these glamorous goblets come to the aid of your New Year’s Eve party.

toc_entry.title: State Secrets
toc_entry.description: Storm damage from alicia may include the public's right to use the beach; Texas pecan growers go nuts over the feds; Mexico’s ruling party turns up the heat on the opposition; why there may be an NCAA football play-off sooner than you think.
